title: My pixel 2 phone is having a completely blank screen
content:
I have tried to turn it on, charge it, connect it to a Chromebook, and all of that stuff. What's odd is that it will make all the noises that it should like phone calls, texts, etc. If I got the power button nothing happens, even for a while. The phone has not been having any other problems.
Edit: 
1. Shining a light into the sensor does not affect the brightness.
